about_the_game:
Discover the most secretive underground racing arena in the world of Hot Wheels™, where the Teku and Metal Maniacs train to compete in the World Race. Welcome to the AcceleDrome! Inside Dr. Tezla's headquarters, you can experience all the thrills of racing and the adventures of AcceleRacers, a real treat for all the fans of the series! An immense space that combines the mysterious charm of a gigantic cave with state-of-the-art technological solutions, featuring a holographic Wheel of Power at its center, dominating the scene.

Explore all the secrets of this new environment aboard Rat-ified™, the powerful rat-rod of the Metal Maniacs, Chicane™, the high-tech muscle car of the Teku team, Spine Buster™, the roaring supercar of Mark Wylde, or Vert’s, the high-performance car of the legendary Vert Wheeler.

Don't miss the AcceleRacers Expansion Pack and build a track worthy of the World Race!

This DLC includes:
  • 1 Environment to build your tracks: AcceleDrome;
  • 4 Vehicles: Rat-ified™, Chicane™, Spine Buster™, Vert’s;
  • 1 new area to add to the Hot Wheels™ Creature Rampage mode;
  • Background, Profile icon, Tag and Card Background to further customize your Unleashed Profile!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Season Pass Vol. 1.

Inside Dr. Tezla's headquarters, you can experience all the thrills of racing and the adventures of AcceleRacers, a real treat for all the fans of the series! short_description: Welcome to the most secretive underground arena in the world of Hot Wheels™: the AcceleDrome! Experience all the thrills of AcceleRacers with the greatest heroes of the series. A new environment and themed vehicles to conquer the Wheel of Power!
